name: Super Square Clash
description:
Super Square Clash is a 2 player game about squares fighting each other to death. They can expand themselves to attack, but also move and jump. The player which hits the other players core 3 times wins. It's also my first game in unity, made in 1 week.

--Controls--
Player 1:
- Moving - A and D
- Attacking - Space
Player 2:
- Moving - Left arrow and Right arrow
- Attacking - Enter
